price: I sjeti se roba Našeg Ejjuba, kada je Gospodaru svome zavapio: "Šejtan me pogodio nedaćama i patnjom!"
arabic: وَٱذۡكُرۡ عَبۡدَنَآ أَيُّوبَ إِذۡ نَادَىٰ رَبَّهُۥٓ أَنِّي مَسَّنِيَ ٱلشَّيۡطَٰنُ بِنُصۡبٖ وَعَذَابٍ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: wa-udh'kur ʿabdanā ayyūba idh nādā rabbahu annī massaniya al-shayṭānu binuṣ'bin waʿadhābin
